Articles.Content:
Floor 4868: a room filled with cherished childhood memories. You walk around and notice this room is filled with your cherished childhood memories archived in full 4K Ultra HD. You find as well you can obtain a bluray set of your memories.

033005122024

new page declared 033105122024

Edited May 12 by AlamoVampire
Floor 4869: The ancient gallery. You take a face from a jar to try on.

Floor 4870: Suddenly you read at the rear side of the face: "Made in France, 1810"

A minute later you realize that the mask is fake, as the French would never write this on the ancient mask

Spoiler

in English
Floor 4871: A small research outpost on Frontier. You have a look around, get to know the kerbals working there and observe a rocket launch before leaving.
Floor 4872: The rocket from the floor 4871, stuck in the floor.
Floor 4873: Rekall. "Have an adventure that feels like real life."

Floor 4874: ... you wake up at 05:20, jump out of bed, and run to the bus stop to be in time at your job, which is 60 km away.

The real life simulation begins!

Floor 4875: Your cubicle at your office 60km away from your house. Your coworkers include various forum members and moderators, cartoon dogs, B1 battle droids, portal Cores, and an Automaton trooper wearing a business suit. You go to your bosses office to talk about planning the floor’s monthly corporate party. asee your boss, a young blue Australian cartoon dog, loudly fire one of your coworkers, and you decide to go back at a different time.

Floor 4876: ... you wake up again and see a nurse [Snip].

Edited May 14 by James Kerman
Redacted by a moderator

Floor 4877: a single slice of cheese with pineapple on it

235005132024
Floor 4878: A massive Food Hall. You find something you like and sit down for some lunch.
Floor 4880: A wall for the Fly.
Floor 4881: A flywheel on the fly wall.
Floor 4882: A planet with a star for said Flywheel wall.
Floor 4883: Magrathea factory floor. You look around to pick a custom made planet.
Floor 4884: A smashed bowl of petunias.

Floor 4885: a lone kerbal in an orange jump suit sitting in a corner quietly crying into the corner.

233905142024

Edited May 15 by AlamoVampire
Floor 4886: 2 Kerbals chatting about the good times.
Floor 4888: 3 Kerbals using stock parts to build a rover.

Floor 4889: a kerbal stealing stock parts for a soup

031305152024
Floor 4890: 4 Kerbals designing something that might fly.

Floor 4891: a crowded airspace

032005152024
Floor 4892: 5 Kerbals rolling their first plane onto a runway.
